about_the_game:
Don't forget to pick up your luggage!


A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP - CARRY-ON PACKAGE BONUSES is the game's digital collector's edition. If you're interested in supporting SKY HOUR WORKS, purchasing this will net you the following:

  • A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP - Yume's Sketchbook (Digital Artbook PDF, featuring 81 pages of concept art and character assets!)
  • A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP - CAMERA ROLL (Folder containing high quality CGs/backgrounds!)
  • A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP - Tunes 4 Trip (Soundtrack Sampler, containing 3 tracks by Arachnibot!)
detailed_description:
Don't forget to pick up your luggage!


A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP - CARRY-ON PACKAGE BONUSES is the game's digital collector's edition. If you're interested in supporting SKY HOUR WORKS, purchasing this will net you the following:

  • A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP - Yume's Sketchbook (Digital Artbook PDF, featuring 81 pages of concept art and character assets!)
  • A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP - CAMERA ROLL (Folder containing high quality CGs/backgrounds!)
  • A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP - Tunes 4 Trip (Soundtrack Sampler, containing 3 tracks by Arachnibot!)
legal_notice: © 2019 - SKY HOUR WORKS (Jeffrey Chiao, Moxie Riles, Evan Thaxter, Christina Crichlow, and Aaron Yoder). All rights reserved. All character designs belong to their respective artists.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A functional one, I hope
  • Additional Notes: Some form of PDF reader is required for both the artbook and dev notes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6+
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Compatible Card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A functional one, I hope
  • Additional Notes: Some form of PDF reader is required for both the artbook and dev notes

short_description: A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP - CARRY-ON PACKAGE BONUSES is the game's digital collector's edition, including a digital artbook, dev notes, and a soundtrack sampler!
